ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on the dark of the night
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:0.5_0: The training rule on asking permission to sit down without asking permission
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā visited families after the meal, and she sat down and lay down on the seats without asking permission of the owners.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.3_0: Feeling scruples because of Thullanandā, people there neither sat down nor lay down.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.4_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.5_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā visit families after the meal, and then sit down and lie down on the seats without asking permission of the owners?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.6_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.7_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.8_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā act in this way?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.12_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā act in this way?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.14_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:1.15.1_0: ‘If a nun visits families after the meal, and then sits down or lies down on a seat without asking permission of the owners, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.6_0: when the middle of the day has passed, until sunset.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.8_0: there are four kinds of family: the aristocratic family, the brahmin family, the merchant family, the worker family.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.12_0: While that family is given to a human being, he won’t enter that family without asking permission.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.14_0: a luxurious couch is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.16_0: if she sits down on that seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.1.18_0: if she lies down on that seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.1_0: If she has not asked permission, and she does not perceive that she has, and she sits down or lies down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.2_0: If she has not asked permission, but she is unsure of it, and she sits down or lies down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.3_0: If she has not asked permission, but she perceives that she has, and she sits down or lies down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.4_0: If she has not been expelled, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.5_0: If she has taken leave, but she does not perceive that she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.6_0: If she has taken leave, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.2.7_0: If she has taken leave, and she perceives that she has, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.2_0: if she sits down or lies down after asking permission;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.3_0: if the seat is permanently put out for her;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.5_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc16:2.3.8_0: The sixth rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
